author: Elon Musk
text:
xAI was reorganized a few days ago to improve speed of execution. As a company grows, especially as quickly as xAI, the structure must evolve just like any living organism.

This unfortunately required parting ways with some people. We wish them well in future endeavors.

We are
translation: xAI几天前进行了重组以提高执行速度。随着公司发展，尤其是像xAI这样快速发展的公司，组织结构必须像任何生物一样进化。

author: Elon Musk
text:
Since xAI was formed just 30 months ago, the small and talented team has made remarkable progress.

The future has never looked more exciting!
translation: 自从xAI成立仅30个月以来，这个小而优秀的团队取得了显著的进步。未来从未如此令人兴奋！

author: Elon Musk
text: Next I’m buying Coca-Cola to put the cocaine back in
translation: 接下来我要收购可口可乐，把可卡因加回去（玩笑）

author: JD
text: speed的情商是非常高的，还有很强的临场应变能力，他的成功绝对不是偶然
translation: Speed (IShowSpeed) has very high emotional intelligence and strong improvisational skills. His success is definitely not accidental.

author: JD
text:
几个板块我喜欢的票
无人机：KTOS，AVAV，ONDS
存储：SNDK
机器人：SYM
核电：LEU，UUUU
稀土：CRML
电池：BE
储能：EOSE
数据中心：iren，cifr
fintech：hood
半导体：AMD，INTC
translation: Some stocks I like in various sectors: Drones: KTOS, AVAV, ONDS; Storage: SNDK; Robotics: SYM; Nuclear: LEU, UUUU; Rare Earth: CRML; Battery: BE; Energy Storage: EOSE; Data Center: IREN, CIFR; Fintech: HOOD; Semiconductors: AMD, INTC

author: JD
text:
现在我炒股就按第一性原理来
比如技术面，你就记住：
高点连线是压力，低点连线是支撑
然后把几个关键的ma，ema，vwap
还有几个重要形态cup with handle，engulfing line，bull flag记一记
很多看似高深莫测的指标，本质还是最上面
这句话
translation: Now I trade stocks based on first principles. For technical analysis, remember: Connect highs for resistance, connect lows for support. Then memorize key MA, EMA, VWAP, and important patterns: cup with handle, engulfing line, bull flag.
